CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Status__c ,"Fully Signed"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Effect"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"Terminated"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"Expired"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"Amended"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"Renewed") ), RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'NDA', OR( $User.Id = OwnerId, CONTAINS($Label.CLM_Profiles, $Profile.Name)), $Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission),
IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4u'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__LightningSelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Generate_Supporting_Document&templateType=Supporting_Document", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__LightningResource/images/actions/generatesupporting.png", "Generate Supporting Document"),"_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__SelectTemplate?id=" &Id & "&action=Generate_Supporting_Document&templateType=Supporting_Document", IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__LightningResource/images/actions/generatesupporting.png","Generate Supporting Document"),"_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: Generate Contract Summary
